description: Pretty much useless, can never get it to run, no tray icon. No Evidence it exist other snap-store saying it's installed. At this point have to assume Malware And remove!
install and other than the snap store saying its installed nothing, shows up or works, no icon n ablity to get it to work, useless

The app functions great. The problem is opening the app. There is no icon to launch it i was able to open it via the command line with 'g-calendar'. There is no icon in the system tray though. Other than having to figure out how to launch the app it works well
summary: Great functionality. Opening is a bit tricky

description: neither there is a way to launch this calendar program, nor this has any notification applet. totally waste of time and bandwidth. atleast for me. i thought it would be straight-forward because this is app is coming from google ... :(
looked promising. Not working for me. Ubuntu MATE 19.04
Aussi bonne qualité que l'appli Google sur Androïd.
summary: Ecore plus rapide et fiable que la version originale sur navigateur

description: Personally I use English and Chinese as my main language. But it seems that it did not support both language at the same time. I try to change language setting but did not work properly. Hope you could solve this please.
summary: It's great, but multi-language supported is needed
